feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Pellets, -0.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 11:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Condition: Ice Pellets
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 19 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: E 30 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets near midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 9:55 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to a few rain showers in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:55 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming southwest 30 late in the evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 9:55 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 9:55 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 9:55 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
